name: william huber
text: The pizza was hot and good.  The service was fantastic.  The cashier was friendly and fun and everyone was busy since it seemed I was there at rush hour.

name: Cong Fu
text: I love that 6 dollar most bestest!

name: Tim White
text: Yum, tried the thin crust very good but order ahead if you are getting any specialty items.

name: Rebecca Creque
text: The food was hot and the employee I spoke to was friendly and cheerful. Also, they were wearing a mask and after a recent experience in another LC this was important to me. Great pizza, my family loves the stuffed crust.

name: Outlandish McCandlish
text: I just found a long brown hair in the Italian Cheese bread. I almost puked.

name: Jah'Meilah Skotawah
text: Ordered 3 meat pizza and it was absolutely delicious. Customer service was decent and there were social distancing procedures in place

name: William Colyer
text: The deep dish is great.  This is a good for quick grab and go pizza.

name: Connie White
text: Great for quick ready made pizza

name: Lance Poling
text: Love the slices & sticks pizza!

name: gary strahm
text: Decent pizza@ a low price

name: Musika Atbp
text: This place is already shut down. Unless I'm mistaken. I visited it at 7:30p and it's closed when online showed open till 10p.  Looked like run down.

name: Laura Bick
text: Best location in the area.

name: Sam Munroe
text: Was only there for a second with my friend who got two pepperoni pizzas. But the combo options look nice. Next time I want some good custom pizza I'll have to stop by.

name: Sharon Kujawa
text: Best customer service!  I was there this past Wednesday night. I wish I had gotten his name, the manager, a young man, very polite to guest as well as his employees. Everyone went above and beyond especially for being a fast food place I didn't feel rushed.

name: Eugene Long
text: Got there at 1:40 and was told it was a 15min wait for a hot and ready lunch box, happened three times now. Food is always good. Staff is always friendly.

name: Devan Thomas
text: I don't think the pizza is terrible... It's just such a 50/50 chance. It's either going to be really good or is that they're going to be really bad. Overall I enjoy their Pizza tho

name: Barry Hopkins
text: Sylvania store is awful.rude employees and never have anything ready thats suppose to be.always a wait

name: K G
text: Good for quick cheese pizza pick up.

name: James Bailey
text: It's hot, it's ready and its 5 bucks, never have any bad experiences and the food is ok.

name: Paul Dickson
text: Exactly what you should expect for a $6 pizza.

name: Zak Kolhoff
text: Little Caesars is one of my favorite places to get pizza! Go in, grab a hot 'n' ready pizza and you are on your way! It's also very affordable!

name: Shirley Goodleman
text: Answers too difficult to answer just yes or no. Pizzas are very good..store is very clean..service is great.

name: KM D

text: Its good. This last time was like I was eating from another pizza place. It was exceptionally good

text: Went here and they aren't even open....remodeling! Not happy!

text: Love the quick service Not a of Employess  care about someone. Who. Has had a Stroke and is Deaf in there Ears Do to Someone hitting them in the Ear alot Barbara Reneau Grycza

name: tiffany wymer
text: Love how quick they are too easy fix for dinner or lunch.

name: Klaus Koenig
text: A quick pepperoni and cheese for lunch.

name: Chris Sundermeier
text: Pre ordered our pizza ahead of time for pick up. Waited an extra 20 minutes longer than our pre order called for. Not typical of them but certainly could have been more efficient.

name: Kristin Huffman
text: I am usually EXTREMELY satisfied with the food and service but there is line employee at this location that is rude and argumentative. I called in a order earlier this week since I requested something other than the hot and ready.  When I ‚Ä¶More

name: Bill Venable
text: Fast service and inexpensive

name: S.L. Whitman
text: Love the price and the taste.

name: Elijah Katsanis
text: The staff live up to the name sake of the company Hot and ready pizzas, they provide a good consistency to their product and are will make a new one pizza on the spot for you if you request it. Also I have noticed it is a good first job/stepping stone for young adults not sure what they want to do for a job.

name: Kevin McQueen
text: Love the crazy bread. Went here for that. The pizza not so much. Went someplace else for pizza.

name: Angie Duwve
text: Good price!

name: Crystal Venia
text: While waiting for my order, noticed worker wiping his nose with the inside of his shirt, than making orders. No gloves, no washing hands. If I were the manager , post noted to all workers

name: Lisa Edwards
text: Love thier cheese one of the best, and bread sticks are amazing!

name: Steve
text: Can't beat the pizza for the price it's delicious and the crazy bread too

name: Laura
text: Pizza the bottom half was missing toppings didnt look until i got home to see this but was pissed!! Do better next timeüò§

name: Pattie Magris
text: Unorganized, always arguing with each other, forgetting items, whos even in charge of these kids? Why are they handling money and making pizzas without washing their hands or wearing gloves?  Other than that i guess they try. Nice to the customers. No leadership

name: Chanielle CH
text: Great Customer Service
